title: Welcome
text:
I’m an ecologist researching biological invasions, culturomics, and digital data for conservation. I use online data, species distributions, and public perception analyses to improve biodiversity policy and public awareness.
Currently, I’m developing tools to support biosecurity, horizon scanning, and public engagement with biodiversity loss.




Invasion pathways and species risk assessment
iEcology and culturomics
Digital conservation tools
Public engagement with biodiversity loss






Canavan, S. et al. (2023) Trending extinctions: patterns in online engagement with recently extinct animals. People and Nature
